contents:
我怀疑文昭的新闻源直接来自BBC的辟谣文，他把辟谣文的谣言直接拿出来给观众当新闻。你们要是好奇的话可...

17:10
https://www.foxnews.com/politics/michigan-gop-chairwoman-says-software-glitch-tallied-thousands-of-republican-votes-as-democrat
17:50
https://www.9and10news.com/2020/11/06/antrim-county-election-results-corrected-after-software-issue-skewed-initial-results/
18:40
https://www.candgnews.com/news/fixed-technical-glitch-earns-kochenderfer-county-commission-seat-119123
文昭谈到了bbc的辟谣并谈了一个很重要的问题
为啥现在知道的这些错误全是有利拜登不利川普的？
